net.sourceforge.metrics.core.sources
Class Cache

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.metrics.core.sources.Cache
public class Cache
extends java.lang.Object

public API to the private database. Currently the database is a jdbm persistent hashtable with MRU cache.

Author:
Frank Sauer
